document_data.name: Parvus Ubler
document_data.mainbody:
'''Parvus Ubler''' is one of the rotten sons of [[Thorm Ubler]] the sole mill-owner of [[Mistledale]]. Parvus and his brother [[Heldo Ubler|Heldo]] are the resident troublemakers of [[Ashabenford]], though they have always somehow dodged being run out of town.

{{stub-person}}
